sen.j: 菊池 武政（きくち たけまさ、1342年（興国3年/康永元年） - 1374年7月6日（文中3年/応安7年5月26日 (旧暦)））は南北朝時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Takemasa KIKUCHI (1342-July 14, 1374) was a busho (Japanese military commander), who lived in the period of Northern and Southern Courts.

sen.e: However, when Sadayo IMAGAWA (Ryoshun) was assigned as the new Kyushu Tandai (local commissioner), Takemasa continuously lost battles with his father.

sen.j: 1373年11月に父・武光が失意のうちに病死する。

sen.j: その後を受けて、家督を継いだ。
sen.e: He took over the role and inherited the family estate.

sen.j: しかし了俊に父の死を付け込まれ、さらに敗戦を重ね、阿蘇惟武に援軍を要請する必要に迫られるほど、菊池氏の勢力は逼迫するようになったと言われている。
sen.e: However, he was taken advantage by Ryoshin about his father's death that he faced more losing battles, and the power of the Kikuchi clan was severely and financially squeezed to the point of demanding a supporting army to Koretake ASO.

However, Ryoshun took advantage of his father's death and further continuously defeated Takemasa; it is said that the military power of the Kikuchi clan became so weak that the clan had to demand Koretake ASO for reinforcements.

sen.j: このように菊池氏の衰勢が顕著になる中、父の後を追うように家督継承後２年の1374年5月26日、33歳の若さで病没。
sen.e: While the Kikuchi Clan power began to diminish, he died of illness at the young age of 33 on July 14, 1374, two years after he inherited the estate, as if he was trying to follow his father.
